Articles.Content: I once had a mod installed that had half dome tanks that would rescale with TweakScale and you could change the paint schemes. For the life of me I can no longer find it on kerbalstuff. Does anyone know which mod that was? It wasn't MI or Behemoth.
If they were big, it might have been Space-Y: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100408-1-0-4-SpaceY-Heavy-Lifter-Parts-Pack-v1-3-1-%282015-10-18%29
I have both SpaceY mods installed, but it's not in there.
Fuel Tanks Plus? The are separate parts (i.e. Tweakscale isn't needed) but other than that it is what you describe.
Whoot whoot!!!! That is the one. Thanks!!!!

Whoot whoot!!!! That is the one. Thanks!!!!

Funny thing is, it's made by the same guy as SpaceY. Glad I could help.

You might also want Color Coded Canisters, it adds the FTP features to the stock tanks.

Edited November 7, 2015 by Alshain

Was this the mod you were thinking of?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129771-1-0-4-Talisar-Parts-v1-0-0?highlight=talisar
Mod question moved to the mod subforum.
KerbaFett, no but I will check it out, they look cool.
Just installed that mod, it's very cool!!! It should support tweakscale, but has some nice radial and inline mounts that you can use for other things. Really excellent!!! Thanks for sharing.
